description: Render an image of a linear directed network graph from a graphviz file. Layouts: dot, neato, twopi, circo, fdp, sfdp, osage & patchwork. More information: https://graphviz.org/doc/info/command.html.

useCases.description: Render a PNG image with a filename based on the input filename and output format (uppercase -O):
Render a SVG image with the specified output filename (lowercase -o):
